title: One Off
synopsis: A slice of life of high school girls in the early summer. Shiozaki Haruno is a 17-year-old girl who loves her motor cycle, HONDA's Giorno. She lives in remote highlands and longs for a vivid life in a city.
characters: ['Rogers, Cynthia B.', 'Maezono, Rie', 'Shiozaki, Haruno', 'Kaburagi, Sayo', 'Bessho, Anri', 'Shiozaki, Mother', 'Kageyama', 'Shiozaki, Father', 'Moto, Yoshi']
